plot: It's the year 2210 and the world has been wiped out by a virus let loose on mankind by an alien race that wants to take over. Before they can do so, they find that two humans have survived ...
title: The Monster Man
plot_es: It's the year 2210 and the world has been wiped out by a virus let loose on mankind by an alien race that wants to take over. Before they can do so, they find that two humans have survived ...
